capabilities.description: Roundcube is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Roundcube is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Roundcube is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Roundcube is able to bypass permission checks for chown.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Roundcube is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions
attrs.description:
Automatically set permissions for the host path.
Enabling this, will check the top level directory,</br>
If it finds incorrect permissions, it will `chown` the
host path to the user and group required for the
postgres container.

attrs.label: Additional Storage
attrs.description: Additional storage for Roundcube.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

1.1.4.readme:
Roundcube

Roundcube is a browser-based multilingual IMAP client with an application-like user interface.
